lead_paragraph: A 68-year-old woman was crossing Amsterdam Avenue at midblock, between 112th and 113th Streets, in the afternoon when she was struck by a charter bus.

headline.print_headline: Tourist From Spain Is Killed by Bus in Manhattan
headline.main: Tourist From Spain Is Killed by Bus in Manhattan

snippet: A 68-year-old woman was crossing Amsterdam Avenue at midblock, between 112th and 113th Streets, in the afternoon when she was struck by a charter bus.
abstract: Wanda Canestri, tourist who was visiting New York City from Spain, is killed after being struck by charter bus in Upper Manhattan.
